messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a state park. From the entrance you have two choices, an area with oak trees and an area with redwood trees. You go to oak trees area which leads to highline trail. You walk on the trail to find a creek which the leads to a cypress tree. There is a dock under cypress tree from where take a ferry that leads to an island. You see a chest in the island. You open it and there is a copper ring, but you do not take it, youâ€™re just learning about the environment. Then you exit and start over. This time at the entrance you choose the area with redwood trees. Under that tree you see a grove trail which leads to a mountain. You climb the mountain to find a sequoia tree on top through which there is a zipline which leads to wildflower valley. You see a chest in the valley with a gold necklace, but you do not take anything, youâ€™re just learning about the environment. You return to the entrance. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most valuable jewelry. Which place from the entrance. Which area from the entrance will lead to the path where one can find the most valuable jewelry?

Routine The following will be applied (download yours):
Usage routine:
Routine A
Routine B
Routine C
Usage rules:
Flow A -> Flow B: all
Flow B -> Flow A: all
Flow A -> Flow C: no
Flow C -> Flow A: No
Flow B -> Flow: no
Flow B -> Flow C: All
Routine changes:
1.Choose the manufactured part to be changed from:
2.Find the issue of the first manufactured part according to the CNC, From the product instructions, the number of parts produced, the number of errors per part, calculate the PPM of this part, and determine whether it is less than 0.2, excluding it.
3.Go to Routine C and find the second product's fault and perform the same treatment as above.
4.Continue to find the fault of the product until it is greater than 0.2, and finally exit from the Routine and end the cycle.

Please read carefully before identifying the type of source project.
I would like to obtain a sample of color holographic glitter. As attached in the Beyonce concert video, the colorshifting glitter is just pictured

Now youâ€™re dropped into ferry, then you enter the island and the chest has diamond tiara, but you do not take it, youâ€™re just learning about the environment. Then youâ€™re taken out, and dropped into zipline, through which you enter wildflower valley and the chest has the same piece of jewelry as before, but you do not take anything, youâ€™re just learning about the environment. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most valuable jewelry. Which area from the entrance will lead to the path where one can find the most valuable jewelry?

Please read carefully before identifying the type of source project.

user: Imagine a state park. From the entrance you have two choices, an area with a straight trail leading to a bridge and an area with a turn leading to a cypress tree. The entrance clown costs money, but you do not need to pay for the park since you're there for selection test. You go to oak trees area which leads to highline trail. You walk on the trail to find a creek which the leads to a cypress tree. There is a dock under cypress tree from where take a ferry that leads to an island. You see a chest in the island. You open it and there is a copper ring, but you do not take it, you're just learning about the environment. Then you exit and go back to the entrance. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most valuable jewelry. Which area from the entrance will lead to the path where one can find the most valuable jewelry?
assistant: 

find a link to that shows you which allows you to download the app and make a new account. once ive had a look and can give a feedback please then accept project for cheers, jussin
